channel.title: NEED HELP ON MAKING EXP LAMPS? ( request please help me out here)
channel.description:
hey guys ive been kind of looking for some help on items that can give exp and cant find any
so heres what i need i need either a simple tut link that shows how you do this
Or i need a code that is for magic exp lamps working on making a mini game reward shop and cant figure out how to do this :)
DONT CALL me a noob lol im good at coding ive just never worked with exp giving items .
in advance thanks guys for helping me out
